media:group.media:title: Emojis and Javascript 👨‍👨‍👦‍👦😎👌
media:group.media:description:
👨‍👨‍👦‍👦.length 
== 14 ...huh?

Library: 
https://github.com/orling/grapheme-splitter

Sources/Inspiration/People I stole from: 
https://thekevinscott.com/emojis-in-javascript/
https://2ality.com/2013/09/javascript-unicode.html
https://flaviocopes.com/javascript-unicode/

TL;DW: Emojis and unicode can act strange in javascript. Use the grapheme splitter library to take care of things.
